nodes.text: The Calian Confederacy was the name used by the Human population of Shiva IV to describe their alliance.

The Calian Confederacy stood opposite the Twelve Tribes of T'Syriél for many generations, locked in a ceaseless civil war until their respective leaders, Kéral Longknife and Aron Peacebringer, united the two groups.
The Humans of the Calian Confederacy were known for their battle strength, a physical reaction to combat that made them more ferocious as the battle grew more intense.
